Card Memory Game
This is a simple card memory game built with JavaScript. 
The game displays a set of cards, each with a hidden image of a football club logo. 
The goal of the game is to match pairs of cards by clicking on two cards at a time to reveal each image. 
If the images match, the cards remain visible and the player earns points. 
If the images do not match, the cards are flipped back over and you must tries again. 
The game continues until all pairs have been matched.

Getting Started
To play the game, open the index.html file in your web browser. The game will start once the page has loaded.

How to Play
Click on a card to reveal its hidden image.
Click on a second card to reveal its hidden image.
If the two images match, the cards will remain visible and you will earn points.
If the two images do not match, the cards will be flipped back over and you will have to try again.
